name: Notes and Comments
description: Contains free-text notes and comments associated with other segments or messages

NTE.1.name: Set ID - Notes and Comments
NTE.1.description: Sequence number for notes segments within message

NTE.2.name: Source of Comment
NTE.2.description: Source or author of the comment

examples: NTE|1|L|Patient reports mild chest pain on exertion
NTE|2|P|Follow up appointment scheduled for next week
notes: All NTE fields are optional but NTE.3 (Comment) contains the primary content
Multiple NTE segments can be used for different types of comments
Often follows PID, OBR, OBX or other segments to provide additional context
